actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to increase the authorization for expenditures relating to Senate activities in connection with participation in interparliamentary institutions and the facilitation of foreign interchanges in the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization for expenditures by the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations for expenses incurred in the interchange and reception in the United States of prominent officials of foreign governments and intergovernmental organizations.

titles.title: A resolution to increase the authorization for expenditures relating to Senate activities in connection with participation in interparliamentary institutions and the facilitation of foreign interchanges in the United States, and for other purposes.
